apps.name: Calory
apps.subtitle: An awesome app.
apps.localizedDescription: This is an awesome app only available on AltStore.

privacy.NSCameraUsageDescription: Camera will be used for scanning food UPC barcodes.
privacy.NSHealthShareUsageDescription: Your health records will be used to access your calory data and profile details.
privacy.NSHealthUpdateUsageDescription: Calory will save dietary calory logged by User.
privacy.NSMicrophoneUsageDescription: Audio is recorded to while searching food. Audio recordings are discarded after transcription.
privacy.NSPhotoLibraryAddUsageDescription: Calory will share photo of recipe details
privacy.NSPhotoLibraryUsageDescription: Calory will share photo of recipe details
privacy.NSSpeechRecognitionUsageDescription: You can view a text transcription of your food search in the app.
